results.title: [A fixed-dose lisinopril and amlodipine combination in conjunction with rosuvastatin in patients with hypertensive disease and coronary heart disease].
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Being safe, the fixed-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ combination is effective in lowering blood pressure in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HD@@@) concurrent with @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@) or @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@atherosclerotic changes in the carotid artery@@@.

citations.NLM: Galeeva ZM, Galiavich AS. [A fixed-dose lisinopril and amlodipine combination in conjunction with rosuvastatin in patients with hypertensive disease and coronary heart disease]. Ter Arkh. 2014;86(9):71-6. PMID: 25518509
